data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Nghệ An, Vietnam know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nghệ An, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Nghệ An, Vietnam.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Nghệ An, Vietnam.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Nghệ An who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, I pray that the Tai Kaleun people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Tai Kaleun people know you.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,697,349, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Nghệ An, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nghệ An, Vietnam has a population of 3,003,200.

We estimate Nghệ An has 64,957 people who might know Jesus, 240,894 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,697,349 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Nghệ An, Vietnam to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
